farmCycles.name: Forget it
farmCycles.devNote: Leaving this logically unfarmable until further notice because it sucks

reusableRoomwideNotable.name: Bug Sand Hole Sand Jumps
note: Cross the Bug Sand Hole with nothing while avoiding the enemies.
Juke the Yapping Maw after entering and kill the Zoa to clear a path over the sand.

reusableRoomwideNotable.name: Bug Sand Hole Damage Boost
reusableRoomwideNotable.note: Wait inside the door frame of the Bug Sand Hole room while a Zoa rises out of the sand. Then use it to cross the room.

reusableRoomwideNotable.name: Bug Sand Hole Speedy Jump Morph
note: With a fast enough jump into the Bug Sand Hole it is possible to cross over the water and land in the opposite door by morphing before reaching the ceiling.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Zoa
Space Jump Through the Door
strats.devNote: This is only useful if canCarefulJump or h_canCrouchJumpDownGrab is disabled or if door 3 is locked.

strats.name: Naked Bug Sand Hole Damage Boost (L to R)
strats.note: From the doorframe, wait for the Zoa to rise out of the water, then use it to damage boost into the open opposite door.

strats.name: Bug Sand Hole Speedy Jump Morph (L to R)
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Bug Sand Hole Speedy Jump Morph
note: Build up run speed and jump into the transition to cross this room without touching the water.
Shoot open the opposite door upon entering and morph before touching the ceiling to bounce into the open door.

strats.name: Bug Sand Hole Speedy Jump Morph with Speed Booster (L to R)
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Bug Sand Hole Speedy Jump Morph
note: Build up run speed and jump into the transition to cross this room without touching the water.
Shoot open the opposite door upon entering and morph before touching the ceiling to bounce into the open door.

strats.name: Shinespark
strats.note: Enter with a high shinespark through the door then shoot the opposite door and fall into it.

strats.name: Space Jump Through the Door
strats.devNote: This is only useful if canCarefulJump or h_canCrouchJumpDownGrab is disabled or if door 3 is locked.

strats.name: Naked Bug Sand Hole Damage Boost (R to L)
strats.note: From the doorframe, wait for the Zoa to rise out of the water, then use it to damage boost into the open opposite door.

strats.name: Bug Sand Hole Speedy Jump Morph (R to L)
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Bug Sand Hole Speedy Jump Morph
note: Build up run speed and jump into the transition to cross this room without touching the water.
Shoot open the opposite door upon entering and morph before touching the ceiling to bounce into the open door.

strats.name: Bug Sand Hole Speedy Jump Morph with Speed Booster (R to L)
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Bug Sand Hole Speedy Jump Morph
note: Build up run speed and jump into the transition to cross this room without touching the water.
Shoot open the opposite door upon entering and morph before touching the ceiling to bounce into the open door.

strats.name: Shinespark
strats.note: Enter with a high shinespark through the door then shoot the opposite door and fall into it.

strats.name: G-Mode Setup - Get Hit By Zoa
Dodge Yapping Maw
strats.note: Escape by wall jumping when the water is low or using a crouch jump and down grab when it's high.

strats.name: Kill Yapping Maw With Super
strats.note: Escape by wall jumping when the water is low or using a crouch jump and down grab when it's high.

strats.name: Freeze Yapping Maw
strats.note: Keep freezing the Yapping Maw while using a frozen bug to escape.

strats.name: Suitless HiJump
strats.note: Kill the Zoa while avoiding the Yapping Maw, then cross the sand. Spring ball can be used to help cross the sand.

strats.name: Suitless Frozen Bridge
note: Freeze the Zoa as it spawns and jump on it then jump across the room.
Freeze any Yapping Maws that attack and use them or a frozen Zoa as a platform to leave.

strats.name: Suitless Kill Yapping Maw with Super
strats.devNote: One Super to cross the room, a second is likely used before getting up to the door.

strats.name: Naked Bug Sand Hole Sand Jumps (L to R)
note: Avoid the Yapping Maw after entering by not standing in one place for too long.
Kill the Zoa and quickly jump across the sand.
Hitting the Zoas will drop Samus deep into the sand below.

strats.name: Dodge Yapping Maw
strats.note: Escape by wall jumping when the water is low or using a crouch jump and down grab when it's high.

strats.name: Kill Yapping Maw With Super
strats.note: Escape by wall jumping when the water is low or using a crouch jump and down grab when it's high.

strats.name: Freeze Yapping Maw
strats.note: Keep freezing the Yapping Maw while using a frozen bug to escape.

strats.name: Suitless HiJump
strats.note: Kill the Zoa while avoiding the Yapping Maw, then cross the sand. Spring ball can be used to help cross the sand.

strats.name: Suitless Frozen Bridge
note: Freeze the Zoa as it spawns and jump on it then jump across the room.
Freeze any Yapping Maws that attack and use them or a frozen Zoa as a platform to leave.

strats.name: Suitless Kill Yapping Maw with Super
strats.devNote: One Super to cross the room, a second is likely used before getting up to the door.

strats.name: Naked Bug Sand Hole Sand Jumps (R to L)
note: Avoid the Yapping Maw after entering by not standing in one place for too long.
Kill the Zoa and quickly jump across the sand.
Hitting the Zoas will drop Samus deep into the sand below.
